name: Runic Depths
description:
A roguelike clicker with very simple gameplay.

Gain gold by killing enemies in the cave.

Get items by descending deeper into the cave.

Items give you more strength, in turn getting you more gold!

When you (inevitably) die, you lose all your items and progress, but keep your gold.

Use gold to buy items for your next run by clicking on the shop on the map.

----------ITEMS----------

Smoke Bomb - Instantly end that combat, but get no gold.

Fire Bomb - Instantly deal 150 damage.

Health Potion - Gain 15 health.

Basic Armor - Start next run with 10 armor.
